org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game

Class SimpleWinningPair

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.util.Pair<java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>,SimpleStrategy>
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game.SimpleWinningPair

  • public class SimpleWinningPair
extends Pair<java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>,SimpleStrategy>
    This class defines a pair of winning region and winning strategy.

    • Constructor Summary
